title: Mango Salsa
short_description: A fresh and flavorful mango salsa that is the perfect accompaniment to fish or chicken dishes. This light and refreshing dish only takes 10 minutes to prepare.
ingredients: 1 jalapeno pepper, seeds removed and finely chopped

steps.title: Combine Ingredients
steps.description: In a bowl, mix together the diced mangoes, red onion, red bell pepper, jalapeno, and cilantro.

steps.title: Add Lime Juice and Seasoning
steps.description: Squeeze the juice of one lime over the mango mixture and season with salt and pepper. Mix well.

steps.title: Serve and Enjoy
steps.description: Refrigerate for a few minutes to allow the flavors to blend, then serve alongside your favorite fish or chicken dish. Enjoy your light and tasty mango salsa!
